desc: Providing pediatric occupational therapy in the greater Philadelphia region. We provide group and individual occupational therapy. Specialty areas include nature based therapy and pediatric chronic pain management.

layout.text: Starfish Occupational Therapy, PLLC provides private community based occupational therapy for children in the Philadelphia region. We offer outdoor Nature Based individual and small group sessions to foster children's connection with the environment while simultaneously improving sensory regulation, social skills, coordination, and daily life skills. Starfish Occupational Therapy facilitates life long growth in grit, grace, character, confidence and knowledge through play in nature.
